scripts.test: set -e; cd test; rimraf elm-stuff; elm make Test.elm --output=main.js; node -e "require('./main.js').Elm.Test.init()"
scripts.sitemap: set -e; cd sitemap; rimraf elm-stuff; elm make Sitemap.elm --optimize --output=main.js; node -e "require('./main.js').Elm.Sitemap.init().ports.print.subscribe(console.log)" > ../publish/sitemap.txt
scripts.build: mkdir publish/js; set -e; rimraf elm-stuff; elm make src/Main.elm --output=publish/js/chaldeas.js --optimize
scripts.dev: mkdir publish/js; set -e; rimraf elm-stuff; elm make src/Main.elm --output=publish/js/chaldeas.js; cd publish; (sleep 2; opener http://localhost:8000/200.html) & elm reactor
scripts.scrape: set -e; cd scraper; rimraf elm-stuff; elm make Scraper.elm --output=scraper.js; (sleep 2; opener http://localhost:8000/scraper.html) & elm reactor
scripts.publish: set -e; npm run build; npm run uglify; npm run sitemap; surge --project ./publish/ --domain chaldeas.surge.sh
